similar_jobs: Senior Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_criteria_list:
Seniority level
Mid-Senior level
Employment type
Contract
Job function
Engineering and Information Technology
Industries
IT Services and IT Consulting
job_description:
We have a GREAT Client looking to hire a Senior .Net Developer for a 6+ month REMOTE Contract.

We Require The Following Skills
5+ years of experience in core .NET
MVC 5
LINQ
ADO.NET
SQL Server/T-SQL
JQuery
JavaScript
Bootstrap
CSS
Team Foundation Server
Able to derive technical requirements from business requirements
Skill for writing reusable libraries
Familiar with various design and architectural patterns
Knack for writing clean, readable, and easily maintainable code
Understanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable application
Advanced skills in documentation, presentation, knowledge transfer and training to team
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
Able to collaborate with business leads and other IT teams

Responsibilities

Perform assigned work including coding, unit testing, fixing defects, documentation, etc.
Submit Timesheets and Client Time Tracking System on a weekly basis
Adherence to established SOP
Participate in the design and development process following SDLC requirements and standards
Take ownership of assigned development components and collaborate with internal/external stakeholders as required
Develop assigned components compliant with Client coding standards and practices.
Document and unit test applications
Delivery of assigned components across multiple environments using Client standards for SAP transports.
Contribute ideas on improving development activities
Provide post-implementation support analyzing system issues in a timely manner
Work with various groups for project planning, estimations and reviews
Requires excellent knowledge of English to document procedures and processes and good communications skills to discuss business problems and recommend information technology solutions
Provide training and knowledge transfer on implemented technologies to Client staff

Main Deliverables

Complete development to meet agreed-to requirements.
Ensure quality of deliverables, including meeting requirements, is scalable, and follows Client standards and aligns with industry practices
Ensure deliverables meet agreed-to project timelines
Document current processes where appropriate.
Provide Knowledge Transfer to Client Team.

If you have the above skills or know someone else that does, please forward the resume in MS Word Format. Thanks!
